      • findProduct

        @RequestMapping(value="/find",
                method=GET)
public com.example.demo.product.entity.Product findProduct(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                        long articleId)
        Retrieves product information from database
        Parameters:
        articleId - Article ID (barcode on product)
        Returns:
        Product information in JSON format if has been found in database. Otherwise empty string

      • findAllProduct

                method=GET)
public java.util.List<com.example.demo.product.entity.Product> findAllProduct()

      • addProduct

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> addProduct(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                         long articleId,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                         float price,
                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(defaultValue="1")
                                                                                                                                         long storageQuantity)
        Adds product information to database
        Parameters:
        articleId - Article ID (barcode on product)
        name - Name of product
        description - Description of product (not required)
        price - Price of product
        storageQuantity - Quantity in storage (default = 1)
        Returns:
        Information "Product has been added"

      • deleteProduct

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete",
                method=DELETE)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteProduct(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                 long articleId)
        Deletes product information from database
        Parameters:
        articleId - Article ID (barcode on product)
        Returns:
        If product with given article ID exists in database information "Product has been deleted". Otherwise "Product has not been found in database"

      • updateQuantityOfProductInStorage

        @RequestMapping(value="updateQuantity",
                method=PATCH)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> updateQuantityOfProductInStorage(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                          long articleId,
                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                          long storageQuantity)
        Updates storage quantity of product
        Parameters:
        articleId - Article ID of product (barcode on product)
        storageQuantity - Quantity
        Returns:
        If product with given article ID exists in database information "Quantity of product has been modified". Otherwise "Product has not been found in database"

      • updatePriceOfProduct

        @RequestMapping(value="updatePrice",
                method=PATCH)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> updatePriceOfProduct(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                           long articleId,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                           float price)
        Updates price of product
        Parameters:
        articleId - Article ID of product (barcode on product)
        price - New price of product
        Returns:
        If product with given article ID exists information "Price of product has been modified". Otherwise "Product has not been found in database"
